name: No Data App
description: Returns NO DATA responses for configured queries.

fields.name: enableNoData
fields.label: Enable No Data
fields.help: Enable or disable NO DATA responses

fields.name: domains
fields.label: Domains
fields.help: Domains to return NO DATA for

fields.name: queryTypes
fields.label: Query Types
fields.help: DNS query types to return NO DATA for (e.g., 'A', 'AAAA', 'MX')
